page.title: 14SHOPPING
page.content: Tesco's is the largest store in Hadleigh and everybody goes there.It sells:clothes,shoes,electrical goods, furniture,D.I.Y.equipment,toys, toiletries,kitchen products,crisps, sweets and drink.It is called a "Home n'wear" store. It is built like a big barn or warehouse and is warm inside,with the lights always on.There are about six checkouts where you pay for your goods which you collect in a large trolley. The entrance has a big porch over it and there are toys for children to have rides on.Outside there is a very large car park and garden centre. When Tesco's first opened, other shopkeepers in Hadleigh were very worried that they would loose trade.The store attracts so many people to Hadleigh,we think the other shops do quite well,so they are happy now.
